name: Haiyan Hu
content: Haiyan (Nancy) Hu Professor, Computer Science University of Central Florida Office: HEC-233 Phone: 407-882-0134 Email: haihu at cs.ucf.edu Mail: UCF, 4000 Central Florida Blvd, Harris Engineering Center, Bldg. 116, Room 233, Orlando, Fl. 32816-2005 Lab Site ____________________________________________________________________________________________ Research Interests · Bioinformatics and Computational Biology ·        Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence: Models and Applications in Biomedical Data Integration and Analysis · <<<Graduate and Undergraduate Research Assisant Positions are available in areas including data mining, machine learning, pattern recognition, modeling and simulation, bioinformatics and computational biology.
